about_the_game:
Echo Signal is an immersive survival crafting adventure game set on an alien planet. Explore a bizarre open world and discover new materials. Craft tools, devices, and structures to overcome the limitations of the harsh desert environment. Unravel the mysteries behind the unknown signals emanating from the hazy silhouettes on the horizon.

Explore and Discover

You were fortunate to land within one of the rare ground-level clouds on this scorching desert planet. This is your chance to adapt to the alien environment, study the nearby minerals, craft essential tools, and expand your base. However, venturing further from the safety of your starting point will lead you into the harsh, unforgiving desert where more mysteries await discovery.

Adapt and Survive

Create equipment that allows you to endure the harsh conditions longer. Build outposts to serve as safe havens under the intense sun. Craft vehicles that enable you to travel farther.

Construct with Immersion

Attach, connect, combine, and link. Physics-driven interactions allow you to build unique structures and vehicles. Manage the power supply for your structures. Create the controlling logic for your devices. Observe the signal chains you've created by connecting everything with physically driven wires.

Follow the Mystery

Locate the sources of the distant, unknown signals and uncover the meaning behind your mission.
